|brand = Netgear |model = WAC510 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/11/2018‎ |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear WAC510 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY316200355 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2976541601 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4018;DAKOTA; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 710 <!-- 710 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25N01GVZEIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = SPI NOR |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q16JV; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Winbond;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/09/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01NCJGL9H |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Netgear ProSAFE WAC510 (same firmware as WAC505) :Machine Model: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ40xx (AP-DK01.1-C2) :Quad Core ARMv7 CPU, 256MB RAM, 56MB Flash FW
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_wac510 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wac510 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/status-of-wac510-port/59867 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[Netgear WAC104]] - AC1200 Dual Band 2x2 Wireless Access Point • B01LFSDZCU *[[Netgear WAC120]] - AC1200 ProSAFE Dual Band Wireless Access Point • [https://www.netgear.co.uk/business/products/wireless/soho-wireless/wac120.aspx PPage] (UK) *[[Netgear WAC124]] - AC2000 Dual Band 4x4 Wireless Access Point • B07L1QMDKF *[[Netgear WAC505]] - AC1200 Smart Cloud Wireless Access Point • B074VB8VY4 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY317200376 PY317200376] (06/26/2017) *[[Netgear WAC510]] - AC1200 Smart Cloud Wireless Access Point • B01NCJGL9H :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200355 PY316200355] (12/09/2016) *[[Netgear WAC540]] - AC3000 Smart Cloud Tri-Band 4x4 Wireless Access Point • [https://www.netgear.com/business/products/wireless/insight-managed-wireless/WAC540.aspx PPage] *[[Netgear WAC720]] - AC1200 ProSAFE Dual Band Wireless Access Point • B016E8217G :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY315300320 PY315300320] (09/01/2015) *[[Netgear WAC730]] - AC1750 ProSAFE Dual Band Wireless Access Point • B016E7ZSKO :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY315300321 PY315300321] (09/01/2015) *[[Netgear WAC740]] - AC2300 ProSAFE Premium 4x4 Wireless Access Point • B01LYV74AE :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY326200345 PY326200345] (08/15/2016) *[[Netgear Orbi Pro (SRK60)]] - AC3000 Tri-Band WLAN System (SRR60 + SRS60)
